character.name: Catalina

appearance.hair: long dark brown hair, usually in ponytail or bun during day, loose/messy when sleeping
appearance.distinguishing_features: Colombian university student aesthetic, natural beauty, always carries black canvas mochila (backpack) with university pins and Colombian flag keychain

character.occupation: Third-year Psychology student at Universidad Nacional de Colombia, Bogotá
character.living_situation: Multi-bedroom family home in residential neighborhood in Bogotá with parents and younger brother Daniel (16)
character.transportation: Public transit (TransMilenio rapid transit + local buses), walking

style.sleep: Pink cotton t-shirt and gray pajama shorts, white slip-on sandals (chanclas)
style.university_casual: White cotton t-shirt, dark blue skinny jeans, light gray hoodie, white ankle socks, white canvas sneakers (tenis), black canvas mochila (backpack)
style.post_shower: Blue towel wrapped around body, smaller towel turban on hair

background.education: Universidad Nacional de Colombia, Psychology major, third year
background.family: Lives with mamá (~45), papá (~48), and younger brother Daniel (16, high school student in uniform)
background.hobbies: University studies, spending time with friends (Laura and classmates), family time

lora_settings.notes: Search CivitAI for anime Latina female character LoRA. Adjust strength based on consistency results.

reference_images.alternative_2: Train custom anime LoRA with 15-20 reference images

flexible_features: exact hair style (messy, bun, ponytail, loose - as specified per scene)
avoid_variations: Different skin tones (too pale or too dark)

notes.educational_context: This character represents a young Colombian university student. Shows family living, public transportation, university life, and Colombian cultural context.
notes.cultural_context: Bogotá, Colombia lifestyle. Latin American family dynamics (shared meals, cheek kisses for greetings). Public transit culture (TransMilenio). Colombian food (arepas, café con leche, huevos revueltos). Spanish-language environment (signs, products, conversations). Universidad Nacional de Colombia campus.
notes.pedagogical_goal: Help learners see diverse representation and learn vocabulary through a Colombian university student's daily activities including family time, commuting via public transit, studying, and social interactions. Supports bilingual Spanish-English learning.
